title: AStA TU Berlin 那个篇 Facebook post 下面的评论真是不堪入目
contents:
https://www.facebook.com/astatuberlin/posts/2930301143670191

很欣慰大部分高赞都是感谢的，但是发布感谢的人多数都遭到了粉红的攻击。

这条评论已经是他们的最高水平了：

If you are really fighting for freedom, why are you killing innocent passers-by, why are you sabotaging the subway and public transportation, why are you using children to carry out violence on your behalf, why are you even attacking any Hong Kong compatriots who do not agree with you? Is this what you mean by fighting for freedom?


这种真是国内教育出来的小年轻：
喂，你妈死了，你爸叫你添点柴火呢


还有怀疑 AStA 蹭热度的：

Read more,watch more,experience more pls.Sending the email without studying the history,without analyzing the problem,without proposing the solution and without reaching HK in person.Yep,U just sit on the fence and say some irresponsible words.真的是看热闹的不嫌事大，TU的AStA真的不是在蹭热度吗？之前平均每条推送几乎没有一条超过三位数的赞，这一条就引发一个小热点了呢🙂



我感觉大陆施行圈养的效果越来越明显了，想移民的尽早移民，因为在大陆你肯定会受到那种信息环境的影响，移民越晚出来需要适应的越多。
